{{also|zug|zúg}} ==English== {{wikipedia|mul=Canton of Zug}} ===Proper noun=== {{en-proper noun}} # A [[canton]] of [[Switzerland]]. # A town in Switzerland, the capital of the canton of Zug. ====Synonyms==== * {{sense|canton}} the canton of Zug ====Translations==== {{trans-top|canton}} * French: {{t|fr|le canton de [[Zoug]]|m}} * German: {{t|de|Kanton Zug}} {{trans-mid}} * Italian: {{t|it|Canton Zugo}} {{trans-bottom}} {{trans-top|town}} * French: {{t+|fr|Zoug}} * German: {{t+|de|Zug}} {{trans-mid}} * Italian: {{t|it|Zug}} {{trans-bottom}} [[Category:en:Cities]] ---- ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|zuc}}, {{m|gmh|zug}}, from {{inh|de|goh|zug}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*tugiz}}, an abstract noun belonging to Proto-Germanic {{m|gem-pro|*teuhaną}}, from {{der|de|ine-pro|*dewk-||to pull, lead}}.{{R:EWddS|hw=Zug|ed=22}} Cognate with {{cog|nl|teug}}, {{cog|hrx|Zugh}}, {{cog|ang|tyge}}. Compare to {{cog|de|ziehen||to pull, to draw}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/t͡suːk/}} {{a|standard}} * {{audio|de|DE-Zug.ogg|Audio}} * {{audio|de|By-Zug.ogg|Audio (Bavarian)}} :* {{IPA|de|/t͡sux/}} {{a|northern Germany and parts of central Germany; chiefly colloquial}} :* {{IPA|de|/t͡suːx/}} {{a|parts of central Germany; chiefly colloquial}} * {{rhymes|de|uːk|ʊx}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|m|Zuges|gen2=Zugs|Züge}} # [[train]] (multiple vehicles one behind the other, particularly travelling on rails) # [[pull]] (force that pulls in a specific direction) # [[draught]] (of air) # [[traction]] # [[course]] # {{lb|de|from a cigarette, etc.}} [[draught]] # {{lb|de|from a drink}} [[draught]], [[gulp]] #* '''1931''', {{w|Arthur Schnitzler}}, ''[[s:de:Flucht in die Finsternis|Flucht in die Finsternis]]'', {{w|S. Fischer Verlag}}, page 36: #*: Ein frisch gefülltes Glas Champagner stand vor ihm. Er trank es in einem '''Zug''' aus – mit Lust, fast mit Begier. #*:: A freshly filled glass of champagne was in front of him. He emptied it in one draught – with pleasure, almost with greed. # [[stroke]] # [[feature]], [[trait]] # {{lb|de|military}} [[platoon]] # {{lb|de|turn based games}} [[move]], [[play]] #: {{syn|de|Spielzug}} ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-m|(e)s|pl=Züge}} ====Derived terms==== {{der3|de |auf den Zug aufspringen |Aufzug |Fernzug |Luftzug |Schnellzug |Sonderzug |Zugbremse |Zugleine |Zugluft |Zugfahrt |Zugvogel |Zugspitze }} ====Related terms==== * {{l|de|zügig}} * {{l|de|Zugzwang}} ====Descendants==== * {{desc|cs|cuk}} * {{desc|hu|cúg}} ===References=== [[Category:de:Smoking]] [[Category:de:Vehicles]]
